Title: Spaghetti Carbonara
Ingredients: Spaghetti, Eggs, Bacon, Parmesan Cheese, Black Pepper
Steps: 1. Cook spaghetti. 2. Fry bacon until crispy. 3. Mix eggs and cheese. 4. Combine everything. 5. Season with black pepper.

Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients: Flour, Butter, Sugar, Eggs, Chocolate Chips, Vanilla Extract
Steps: 1. Cream butter and sugar. 2. Add eggs and vanilla. 3. Mix dry ingredients. 4. Combine wet and dry. 5. Fold in chocolate chips. 6. Bake.
